instructions: Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 1 1 Open TikTok. It s the app with a music note inside. You ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android). Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 2 2 Tap the profile icon. It s the outline of a person at the bottom-right corner of the screen. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 3 3 Tap . This displays a list of people you re following. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 4 4 Look for the user you think has blocked you. If you were following that user and they ve blocked you, they will disappear from your Following list. Advertisement

Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 5 1 Open TikTok. It s the app with a music note inside. You ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android). Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 6 2 Tap the notifications icon. It s the square speech bubble at the bottom of the screen. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 7 3 Tap a comment or mention you made on that user s video. You can also tap any tags of you they added to their posts. If you cannot view the video, there s a chance you may have been blocked. Try to follow the person to find out for sure. Advertisement

Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 8 1 Open TikTok. It s the app with a music note inside. You ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer (if you have an Android). Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 9 2 Open the discover page. This has a globe or magnifying glass icon. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 10 3 Type the person s username and tap the key. A list of results will appear. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 11 4 Tap the person s username. If you re blocked, their account will hide its bio and videos, and you will see "You can't view this person's videos due to their user privacy settings". This may not mean you are blocked, however some accounts are hidden to everyone except a few people. Image titled Know if Someone Blocked You on Tik Tok Step 12 5 Tap . If you are able to follow this person (or able to request to follow), you haven t been blocked. If you see a message that says You can't follow this account due to their user privacy settings, you ve likely been blocked by this user. Advertisement
